DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect International Child Development Program ( ICDP ) . Research question answer : 1 . Does ICDP affect child 's psychosocial functioning compare treatment usual ? 2 . Does ICDP change parent-child interaction ?
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study International Child Development Program
DOC.criteria: SDQ > /= 9 , subjective treatment need Already treatment
